name: timed
description:
A game by Julian Gardisky

Music by Matt Thorson (http://www.mattmakesgames.com/)
and Julian Gardisky (JGblkshot@gmail.com)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
You have been awaken inside a mysterious laboratory,
thrown into a madhouse of experimental obstacle
courses.
However, why?
Find your way to regain your memory, escape the
labs, and make your way back to the surface through
over 100 fast-paced levels.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
CONTROLS:
WASD-Change Camera
Spacebar-Jump
Shift-Jump
UPArrow-Jump
LEFTArrow-Move Left
RIGHTArrow-Move Right
DOWNArrow-Fall through
P-Pause Game
R-Restart Current Level
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
